column1: ALSO flu hits hard in USA where medical care is super expensive so people don't get treated. Government is covering all coronavirus costs in China.
Can’t have the coronavirus without a little lyme disease
So that's where Corona virus came from https://twitter.com/katienotopoulos/status/1228071950179880960 …
RT @allieyoung13: The death toll on #NavajoNation has reached 298 due to #COVID19. That’s 298 Navajo lives including 5 Medicine People gone…
RT @trishgreenhalgh: Above all, don’t be poor.

I’m sorry but these institutions closing over this manufactured virus scare has me fearing some form of state mandated martial law/curfew is coming next. 

Are there any countries that aren’t hyping up the Corona Virus and using it to exert undue power over their citizens?
